Raikou (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0242: Blissey
Pokémon
#0244: Entei →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Raikou (TCG Pocket).

Raikou has been featured on 22 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Revelation expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Raikou cards are normally Lightning-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Raikou

Raikou
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
